python:
def Merge(array, start, mid, end):
    left = start
    right = mid + 1
    i = 0
    temp = [None] * 100
    while left <= mid  and  right <= end:
        if array[left] < array[right]:
            temp[i] = array[left]
            i += 1
            left += 1
        else:
            temp[i] = array[right]
            i += 1
            right += 1
    while left <= mid:
        temp[i] = array[left]
        i += 1
        left += 1
    while right <= end:
        temp[i] = array[right]
        i += 1
        right += 1
    length = end - start + 1
    for j in range(length):
        array[start + j] = temp[j]

def MergeSort(array, start, end):
    if start < end:
        mid = start + (end - start) // 2
        MergeSort(array, start, mid)
        MergeSort(array, mid+1, end)
        Merge(array, start, mid, end)

myArray = [5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 9, 8, 6, 7]
MergeSort(myArray, 0, 8)
for i in range(9):
    print(myArray[i])
